title: wanting a logo saying Third Street
content:
i am trying to get a logo type done saying Third Street I have racked my brain and dont have the know how to do it in these styles or know what font was used, can people on here help me, would be so very greatfull. Im thinking street,urban something that will last. THANKS

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ingenuity.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020063836/http:/typophile.com/files/ingenuity_0.jpg) | 38.1 KB |
| [visualinfinity.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020063836/http:/typophile.com/files/visualinfinity_0.jpg) | 37.91 KB |
| [toughorsuffer.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020063836/http:/typophile.com/files/toughorsuffer.jpg) | 65.22 KB |
author: dynamic

comments.content:
These would have all been drawn by hand I imagine.

Ross

Agreed, the look and feel you hope to achieve requires custom lettering.

-----------------------  
Michael Browers  
 [www.michaelbrowers.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020063836/http:/www.michaelbrowers.com/ "www.michaelbrowers.com")

I'd be happy to design a custom logotype for you. What's your budget?  
Feel free to contact me via email.

----------  
**Paul Ducco**  
 [Logo Design Australia](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020063836/http:/www.solid-creative.com/identity.htm)
